name: CALayerDelegate
desc: Methods your app can implement to respond to layer-related events.

items.name: func display(CALayer)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to implement the display process.

items.name: func draw(CALayer, in: CGContext)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to implement the display process using the layer's CGContext.

items.name: func layerWillDraw(CALayer)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate of an imminent draw.

items.name: func layoutSublayers(of: CALayer)
items.desc: Tells the delegate a layer's bounds have changed.

items.name: func action(for: CALayer, forKey: String) -> CAAction?
items.desc: Returns the default action of the action(forKey:) method.
